title: Retail revenue from smart wearable devices worldwide 2014 and 2019
yAxis: Retail revenue in billion U.S. dollars
summary: The statistic shows the Retail of revenue billion from a Retail subscription in the wearable in 2014 and 2019 .
In the presented time period , the Retail of revenue billion from Retail increased from 4.5 billion to 53.2 billion .
